page.title: 12Hatherop Castle
page.content: { Hatherop Castle}is not a castle it is a large manor house. The present building was first built in Elizabethan times but sadly in 1860s much of it was destroyed when a candle set light to a bedroom curtain . There are many curious stories concerning the castle between 1862 and 1867 it was owned by the{Maharajah {Dulip Singh},who caused consternation by taking potshots with a rifle at the deer in the gardens of{Williamstrip {House.}As the path of the bullets crossed the road the villagers felt that they were under attack. During the Second World War secrecy descended on the castle for it was taken over by the{Special Operations {Executive S.O.E.}It was used for the training of agents who were later parachuted into occupied Denmark. {continued on page 13
